"you’ll likely place lower than where you ended the previous season."

So what is lower than Bronze V?
Wood i guess, but you never know :) Wood V here i come
Riot's new tier for season 5 :>
Well challenger is the highest so i think it appropriate that challenged is the lowest.
bahaha  GG not even qualify for bronze {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
They don't actually let you join ranked in 2015 because there is nothing lower.
XD
"pull those tryhard pants on". Income the bronze league, "rank is for tryhards"

So, this time, i won't win all 10 of my placement games and end up in bronze 5. 
Thanks riot
really dissapointed that I didnt give a crap about my rank last season then...

you're making oceanic players look bad dude -.-
just pick a reset champ like katarina, akali, master yi, jinx, tristana and 1v5 their team.if you are as good as you say you are then you dont need a team in bronze. i started off at bronze and now im gold 5.

I started in Bronze III like 4 months ago so i took a break from ranked for awhile. I started playing ranked again this week and i climbed up to Silver V in about 3 days, if you say you are better than Bronze just go for it :/
Learn to play support, duo with a good stable friend as it means 1 less idiotic person and try escape Bronze :) best of luck.

What is the formula for calculating the soft reset?  If you're confident that its good then tell us all and open it up to community scrutiny.

In the past it was rumoured to be "Current MMR + 1200 / 2".  So if a player had a low MMR he/she actually gained MMR in the soft reset.  It was only players above about Silver 4 that start to lose MMR.

It shouldn't be a secret.  Just tell us the formula.

Challenger players could lose all ten games and end up in Silver during the 2014 placements, while Bronze players could go on lucky winning sprees and end up in Plat

fuck off, that NEVER happened.
soft reset 0-10 challengers still ended plat, same as 10-0 challengers because plat 1 was highest you could get from soft reset. no challenger ended lower than plat and thats a fucking FACT.

same with bronze. 10-0 bronze couldnt get into gold. unless they duoed with a fucking challenger and vsed high golds and plats. but that never happened.

dont fucking lie to us and then use the exact same system as every other season.
Preach it
your a fuking idiot cunnt
logged in to downvote and ask if you were mad {{champion:35}}

its all true tho...

they are changing the way placements work, because of false %%%% saying that challengers got placed into silver if they went 0-10. i know for a fact 2 challengers in season 3 who went 1-9 and still ended in plat 2. they duo'ed and trolled trying to get 0-10 to see how far they dropped. they got back into challenger in 59 games. 50 wins and the 9 losses in placements. 1 is now master and the other quit.

its just not true that the placements had THAT much impact to drop someone that low if their MMR was atleast half decent.
They might be exaggerating, but challenger to plat is no small drop. They got back in 59 games and ONLY because they apparently won every single game after their losses.

challenger to plat, when plat was the highest ranking after placements is a TINY drop.

riot said challengers could drop to bronze....they were %%%%%%ed in saying that. end of story.

Really who cares about the new season this ranked system is so stuffed at bronze level there is very little incentive to play.  With the plethora or players that feed, AFK or are just negative players looking to advance are continually hamstring.  Riot why doesn't OCE have and active tribunal system yet? How many seasons must we wait before the vermin are cleared out???
If I was reviewing this game it would get 3 out of 100 at best!!

there are more mobas out there that have a much better community and ranked system. try hon, it used to cost $30 to buy the game but its free to play and is pretty much like dota (same hero just diffrent names and looks)
"try hon" lol?

IF you're above average for your division then technically you have a better chance of winning than your opponents as you should be better than them, there are only four other people on your team that can feed or go afk and there are 5 on the enemy team, so basically if you should be in a higher div then if you play enough you will get there.
You put it perfectly, you're words should be delivered to the masses. {{champion:13}} Approves
"you're words" All this time I thought he was a breathing human....

To all the bronzes QQing in the comments, spend less time complaining and more time getting good and you will climb out. If you are in bronze it's cause you deserve to be, understand that and you'll have a far better chance of improving.
I was b5 then using my mains jinx, vayne , tristana , and top rek sai and top jarven i got to s5 in 4 days figure that out.
reksai and J4 are OP.....bam, figured out.
i was bronze 5 mid season 4 then i realised wait you know what, im the shit person not my teammates so i elo boosted, jokes, i just stopped flaming

but thats the thing, i was telling you that those 2 are OP champs. which they really really are. and need to be nerfed to stop being so broken.

it doesnt matter if your mentality changed. if you spammed those 2 enough anyone could get to silver.
I'd like to see matchmaking take experience into account, too often I find one team with vastly more experience & the other team just got lucky during placements.
